snippet.title: Folletti -Steam AngelSix Trailer-
snippet.description:
In Folletti, you play as Yezac Folletti who awakes to find his wife has been snatched away by the disturbing Degenite Church in the land of Krycek. Folletti must scour this bizarre land in search of clues with the help of friends and creatures you meet along the way to aid you in odd quests and the search for deadly weapons. As Folletti you will unveil hidden conspiracies, delve into terrifying areas, and make a few friends along the way.
In this trailer, you meet the creepy AngelSix.
Open world-
Graded endings-
Crafting-
Dark Comedy-
Horror-

Play on Steam
https://store.steampowered.com/app/2151920/Folletti/

For Merch and News
https://ynightmareproductions.com/
